pullrequest.title: Set the pose of a visual

content.raw:
It would be nice to create a little test for it. Maybe an integration test which sets the visual pose from physics and then checks that the pose changed on the rendering side.

I've been writing some tests for the undo functionality which are quite similar to what I suggested, so I can help with a test if needed.
content.html:
It would be nice to create a little test for it. Maybe an integration test which sets the visual pose from physics and then checks that the pose changed on the rendering side.

I've been writing some tests for the undo functionality which are quite similar to what I suggested, so I can help with a test if needed.
